text: The 2007 European Karate Championships, the 42nd edition, were held in Bratislava, Slovakia from 4 to 6 May 2007. ==Medallists== ===Men's competition=== ====Individual==== {| |- | Kata | Luca Cvetkovski | Borislav Ivanov * * * Dimítrios Triantafýllis |- | Kumite −70 kg | Rafael Aghayev | Serkan Yağcı | Omar Omarov * * * Diego Vandeschrick |- | Kumite −75 kg | Luigi Busà | Matija Matijevič | Mourad Gadzhiev * * * Cédric Sioussaran |- | Kumite −80 kg | Iván Leal | Andrej Harničár | Alessandro Nardi * * * Dejan Vozlič |- | Kumite +80 kg | Stefano Maniscalco | Alen Zamlić | Aleksandr
